page.title: 05FARMING
page.content:
The improvement in machinery over the years has made the job of a farmer much easier.During the course of this century, combine harvesters, forklifts, tractors and other machinery have taken the place of horses and the number of farm workers has gone down.
Over the years farm work has changed a great deal since machinery came. Tractors have taken the place of horses and other machines can do jobs better and more quikly than men.This means the number of workers has gone down.Nowadays a farm will employ only a very few men,and the "{bothy}" will not be used.(The bothy was a farm cottage where the single men catered for themselves)
